page.title: 03CASSOP SPORTS DAY
page.content: Cassop Sports Day is a very big local event.Tom Wilson organises it.He sends forms out which asks us what races we want to do.Before the day comes we all have a practice which we call the heats.Tom gives us a ticket for a bag of sweets.All of this happens on our playing field. We go to the field in the morning and watch the seats,tents and side shows being set up.If we are in the fancy dress we go home to get ready.Everyone marches to the field following the jazz-bands. The hot dogs smell lovely.The atmosphere is great:people running around laughing.Nina the ice-cream lady comes. After our races we receive medals.We finish the day with a family disco.
